Name: Colorizers
Description: This example aims to get you familiar with all types of colorizers you may use to change the visualization of RadTreeMap/RadPivotMap controls.
KeyWords: Colorizers,  typedefinitions, brushcolorizer, layoutstrategy, desaturationcolorizer, palettecolorizer, valuebrushcolorizer, rangebrushcollection, valuegradientcolorizer, radtreemap

Name: Mappings
Description: This examples shows how to set the properties for the nodes of the RadTreeMap and RadPivotMap control depending on a custom business logic.

Name: Populating With Data Pivot Map
Description: This example shows how to populate RadPivotMap with data. RadPivotMap expects data in tabular format and displays a treemap with grouped data, according to the GroupDefinition-s set.
KeyWords: Populating With Data Pivot Map,  databinding, radpivotmap, groupdefinitions

Name: Populating With Data Tree Map
Description: This example shows how to populate RadTreeMap with data. RadTreeMap control expects a hierarchical collection and presents the data according to the TypeDefinitions set.
KeyWords: Populating With Data Tree Map,  databinding, custommapping, mvvm, typedefinition, radtreemap

Name: Selection
Description: The sample demonstrates the selection feature of the tree map.
KeyWords: Selection,  radtreemap, radpivotmap, palettecolorizer, treemaptypedefinition, isselectionenabled, pivotmapgroupdefinition

Name: Styles And Tempaltes Pivot Map
Description: This section is intended to give you a broad understanding of the possible ways in which you can change the visual appearance of the RadPivotMap. You can use the RadPivotMap.LeafItemStyle, GroupDefinition.ItemStyle and TypeDefiniton.ItemStyle properties.
KeyWords: Styles And Tempaltes Pivot Map,  leaftemplate, radpivotmap, groupdefinition, databinding

Name: Styles And Templates Tree Map
Description: This section is intended to give you a broad understanding of the possible ways in which you can change the visual appearance of the RadTreeMap. You can use the RadTreeMap.DefaultItemTemplate, TypeDefinition.ItemTemplate and TypeDefiniton.ItemStyle properties.
KeyWords: Styles And Templates Tree Map,  typedefinitions, itemstyle, databinding, mvvm, radtreemap
